title: EIPIP Meeting 96
body:
# Date and Time

Dec 13, 2023 at 16:00 UTC

# Location

Zoom: TBA in the Discord #eip-editing channel

YouTube Recording: [EIPIP Meetings](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpLrRIkDlBjDUUrGgF91pQw)

# Agenda

## 1. EIP Process Standardization

- [ ] Updates on [pending tasks for repo split](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/issues/1) 
- [ ] Web Page Rendering 

## 2. Discuss Open Issues/PRs, and other topics
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/154
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7958
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7956

### Call for Input

Call For Input | Status | Result | Comments
-- | -- | -- | --
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/287 | Open | - | Deadline completed on Nov 19, 2023|
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/291 | Open | - | 1 Editor voted to oppose. Multiple other responses added. The deadline ended on November 30, 2023.|
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/293 | Open | - | 2 Editors opposed to merging the PR. The deadline ended on Dec 09.

### Changes to `Final` proposals
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/74 | https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/75 | https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/76
- [ ] update ERC1271 Ref [comment](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/285#issuecomment-1788105803) @frangio
- [ ] [Post EIP/ERC Split: Represent each side as Camps in Ethereum Magicians](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/post-eip-erc-split-represent-each-side-as-camps-in-ethereum-magicians/16271) @NetWalker108 
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/61 (Draft proposition for ERC-1) @Joachim-Lebrun

## 3. Other discussions continued or updates from past meetings
### Changes to `Final` EIPs 
- Why `Final` EIPs are "Immutable"?
- Specify conditions under which `Final` EIPs can be updated.

## 4. EIPs Insight - Monthly EIPs status reporting.
- [Hackmd](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EIPsInsightDecember2023)
- [EIPsInsight.com](https://eipsinsight.com/insight/2023/12)

## 5. [EIP Editing Office Hour](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EIPEditingOfficeHour)
- Agenda [Meeting 30](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/301) & Recording [Meeting 29]()

## 6. Review action items from earlier meetings
- [Summary meeting 95](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/297#issuecomment-1832843142)

## Next Meeting date & time 

Jan 10 at 16:00 UTC?

Need a process for moving/cloning EIPs as RIPs and how they are numbered.
EIP7212 has been moved or cloned (not clear on which yet) and whether it is best to keep the same number: https://github.com/ethereum/RIPs/pull/5/files#r1424823634

Can't attend the meeting as the time is incompatible with life in Australia.
If time permits, @smartprogrammer93 and I would be happy to discuss an idea to introduce a versioning scheme for Standards Track EIPs: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8034
